doc:
Ivor Roberts (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivor_Roberts_(actor) 0 Ivor Roberts (19 July 1925 – 5 September 1999) was an English actor and a television continuity announcer who often appeared in comedic roles. Born in Nottingham, he returned to acting following service in the Royal Navy during the Second World War. Roberts started his television career as a continuity announcer on regional television in Wales, working for TWW before that company lost its franchise in 1968. Among his better-known roles were the characters of Arnold Thomas in the 1995-97 television series Oh, Doctor Beeching! and Mr Barnes in the second, third and fourth series of You Rang, M'Lord?. He also made a guest appearance, as a police officer, in one episode of George and Mildred. Another notable appearance was as Mr. Chick in Dombey and Son. He also played a part in "Porridge". He died in Cardiff, Wales, in 1999 at the age of 74. Ivor_Roberts ( 19_July_1925 – 5_September_1999 ) was an_English_actor and a_television_continuity_announcer who often appeared in comedic_roles . Born in Nottingham , he returned to acting_following_service in the_Royal_Navy during the_Second_World_War . Roberts started his_television_career as a_continuity_announcer on regional_television in Wales , working for TWW before that_company lost its_franchise in 1968 . Among his_better-known_roles were the_characters of Arnold_Thomas in the_1995-97_television_series_Oh , Doctor_Beeching ! and Mr_Barnes in the_second_,_third_and_fourth_series of You Rang , M'Lord ? . He also made a_guest_appearance , as a_police_officer , in one_episode of George_and_Mildred . Another_notable_appearance was as Mr._Chick in Dombey_and_Son . He also played a_part in " Porridge " . He died in Cardiff , Wales , in 1999 at the_age of 74 .
